testsuite.name: com.sample.modules.OfferPage
testsuite.system-out:
Step :: Click oon super offer tab in header.

Normal

Step :: Verify offer page opend.

Step :: Click on trending radio button.

Step :: Click on icici checkbox.

Step :: Verify all offers have icici bank logo with terms and conditions.

PASS : verifyOfferPageTrendingICICIFilter

Step :: Click oon super offer tab in header.

Normal

Step :: Verify offer page opend.

Step :: Click on hotels radio button.

Step :: Click on axis checkbox.

Step :: Verify all offers have axis bank logo with terms and conditions.

PASS : verifyOfferPageHotelAxisFilter

Step :: Click oon super offer tab in header.

Normal

Step :: Verify offer page opend.

Step :: Click on flights radio button.

Step :: Click on hdfc checkbox.

Step :: Verify all offers have hdfc bank logo with terms and conditions.

PASS : verifyOfferPageFllightsHDFCFilter
